metadata.title: CVE-2019-17350 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Xen through 4.12.x allowing Arm domU attackersto cause a denial of service (infinite loop) involving acompare-and-exchange operation.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-17350` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxencall1t64 - 4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1
libxendevicemodel1t64 - 4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1
libxenevtchn1t64 - 4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1
libxenforeignmemory1t64 - 4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1
libxengnttab1t64 - 4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1
libxenhypfs1t64 - 4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1
libxenmisc4.17t64 - 4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1
libxenstore4t64 - 4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1
libxentoolcore1t64 - 4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1
libxentoollog1t64 - 4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1
xen-hypervisor-4.17-amd64 - 4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1
xen-hypervisor-4.17-arm64 - 4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1
xen-hypervisor-4.17-armhf - 4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1
xen-hypervisor-common - 4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1
xen-system-amd64 - 4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1
xen-system-arm64 - 4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1
xen-system-armhf - 4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1
xen-utils-4.17 - 4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1
xen-utils-common - 4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1
xenstore-utils - 4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: xen package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.11.3+24-g14b62ab3e5-1ubuntu1').
